name: HiAnime
desc: Free anime streaming portal with sub/dub catalogs and frequent domain/mirror churn.

name: Gogoanime
desc: Free anime site offering subbed and dubbed episodes with a large library and regular updates.

name: Miruro
desc: Anime streaming brand promoting free HD streams and tracking-style features like AniList sync.

name: Enma
desc: Free anime streaming site offering subbed and dubbed anime with a simple catalog layout.

name: Animetsu
desc: Anime streaming brand that appears across multiple domains and can be JS-heavy/unstable to access.

name: AniWatchTV
desc: AniWatch-branded anime streaming portal with sub/dub listings and frequent lookalike branding online.

name: Kaido
desc: Free anime streaming catalog with sub/dub options and fast-updating episode releases.

name: AniCrush
desc: Anime streaming site with community features and a third-party content disclaimer style common to aggregators.

name: AnimeKai
desc: Anime streaming portal offering sub/dub titles and a homepage-driven catalog of trending shows.

name: MangaBall
desc: Manga reader platform centered around community translations and chapter uploads.

name: Atsumaru
desc: Fast, ad-free manga/manhwa/manhua reader with open-source and self-hosted roots.

name: Kagane
desc: Manga/webcomics reading platform positioning itself as a premium reading experience with policy pages.

name: Comick
desc: Manga discovery and reading site with tracking/community features and some historical domain confusion.

name: MangaDex
desc: Large manga translation aggregation platform with community uploads and broad discovery features.

name: 1Shows
desc: Free streaming-style portal for movies and TV with a catalog-first browsing experience.

name: 1Flex
desc: All-in-one streaming portal with sections for movies, TV, live TV, and sports.

name: RgShows
desc: Streaming portal that publishes a DMCA page and provides third-party links; includes torrent-navigation pages.

name: AlienFlix
desc: Movies/TV streaming catalog with a common â€œdoes not store filesâ€ third-party linking disclaimer pattern.

name: FlickyStream
desc: Streaming-style movies and TV site marketed around fast browsing and high-quality playback.

name: SFlix
desc: Free movies and TV streaming brand with aggregator-style disclaimers and a large catalog layout.

name: FMovies-HD
desc: FMovies-branded free streaming portal with third-party linking disclaimers and a catalog of movies/series.

name: StreameX
desc: Aggregator-style portal spanning multiple media types, with a published legal/DMCA page and broad catalog.

name: NTVSTREAM
desc: Live sports and IPTV-style portal offering multiple stream servers and 24/7 channel navigation.

name: Public IPTV
desc: Directory of IPTV channels by country and category with a playlist-like browsing structure.

name: xStreamEast
desc: StreamEast-branded site advertising free live sports streams across major leagues.

desc: Live world TV directory that indexes publicly available channels in a simple map-like interface.

name: Wegic
desc: AI website builder that creates and publishes sites via chat-style prompts and iteration.

name: InVideo
desc: Online video creation platform with templates and AI-assisted workflows for fast editing.

name: UI Ball
desc: Handy frontend resource featuring lightweight open-source loaders, spinners, and UI snippets.

name: Anime.js
desc: JavaScript animation library for building smooth, flexible web animations with a simple API.

name: Stirling PDF
desc: Open-source, self-hostable PDF toolkit for converting, editing, redacting, and automating PDF tasks.

name: FilePizza
desc: Peer-to-peer file sharing in the browser using WebRTC for direct transfers without uploading to a server.

name: Zoo
desc: Modern CAD and hardware design platform featuring a conversational assistant for creating 3D designs.

name: ChatEDU
desc: AI study tools for students, including practice questions and citation-oriented learning helpers.

name: Symbolab
desc: Step-by-step math solver covering algebra through calculus and beyond with worked solutions.

name: Mathway
desc: Math problem solver for a wide range of topics with guided steps and app-based features.

name: Logo Diffusion

name: AirConsole
desc: Multiplayer gaming platform where phones act as controllers for party games on a shared screen.

desc: Open-source library of animated, interactive React UI components for building punchy interfaces.

name: ProPhoto
